metadata.title: CVE-2022-2884 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 11.3.4 prior to15.1.5, 15.2 to 15.2.3, 15.3 to 15.3 to 15.3.1 allows an an authenticateduser to achieve remote code execution via the Import from GitHub APIendpoint

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
